products.title: Ubtan Face Wash - 100ml
products.body_html:
Get a natural glow & brightness with this traditional ubtan facewash. Enriched with Haldi & Multani Mitti, this face wash:
Detoxifies the skin, clears the pores & deeply cleanses the skin.
Contains niacinamide to retain skin hydration
Rejuvenates the skin for a youthful glow.
  1. GET THAT GLOW: The natural ubtan face mask is loaded with the goodness of Turmeric, Multani Mitti, Neem and Tulsi to deep cleanse dead skin cells, removes dark spots, add an extra glow and pampers your skin to feel rejuvenated.
  2. DEEP SKIN CLEANSER: The ancient skin-healing ayurvedic recipe is formulated with a modern blend. You can leave behind all that fuss and count on Ubtan Face Wash to clear out all the dirt and impurities from within, leaving the skin glowing and spotless.
  3. BRIGHTENS DULL AND PIGMENTED SKIN: Continuous exposure to the sun results in suntan, pigmentation, and early signs of aging. Ubtan Face Wash is your one-stop solution that protects skin from free radical damage and lightens tan to get even-toned skin.
  4. CLEAR AND ACNE-FREE SKIN: Turmeric present in this face wash has antibacterial and antifungal properties that help minimize pesky pop-outs while the antioxidants in Multani Mitti lighten blemishes and impart clear, glowing skin.
  5. GENTLE, EFFECTIVE & SAFE: Crafted with skin-nourishing ingredients, the face wash for women and men is free from parabens, sulfates, SLS or harmful chemicals.

products.title: Vitamin C Face Wash - 100ml
products.body_html:
Cleanse & brighten your skin every day with the superfood Vitamin C face wash enriched with Witch Hazel & Hibiscus. This face wash:
Boosts antioxidants to fight pigmentation, dark spots & uneven skin tone.
Balances the pH & improves skin's complexion.
Deeply cleanses to remove impurities, dirt & grime and makes the skin glowing & bright.
  1. DEEP SKIN CLEANSER: An incredible face wash loaded with vitamin C that cleanses the skin from deep layers without stripping away natural oils, balances and restores skin’s pH level while also tightening the pores.
  2. DELAYS SIGNS OF AGEING: Vitamin C helps boost collagen production, diminishes fine lines, and wrinkles, and maintains skin elasticity, leaving skin younger-looking, plump and refreshed.
  3. BRIGHT AND GLOWING SKIN: The antioxidant and skin-brightening properties in vitamin C help lighten suntan, pigmentation, dark spots, and blemishes, improving skin texture and complexion.
  4. ALL-NATURAL AND HERBAL EXTRACTS: Fortified with power-packed ingredients like Aloe Vera Gel, Hibiscus, Neem, Witch Hazel and many others, the face wash for glowing skin retains skin moisture, and repairs and nourishes skin deep within.
  5. GENTLE, EFFECTIVE & SAFE: Crafted with skin-nourishing ingredients, the face wash for women and men is free from parabens, sulfates, SLS, or harmful chemicals.
products.tags: fac wash, face care, face wash, face wash 50 ml, face washes, glowing skin, skin care, vitamin c, vitamin c face wash

products.title: Wild Rose Lip Butter
products.body_html: Made from Wild Rose Petals and Vitamin E, this lip balm heals chapped & dry lips. Enriched with numerous organic kinds of butter & SPF 20, it deeply moisturizes, gives a natural bright tint, and protects against sun damage.

products.title: Wild Rose lip butter and Pure Rose Water
products.body_html:
Wild Rose Lip Balm: Made from Wild Rose Petals and Vitamin E, this lip balm heals chapped & dry lips. Enriched with numerous organic kinds of butter & SPF 20, it deeply moisturizes, gives a natural bright tint, and protects against sun damage.
Pure Wild Rose Water: Made from wild roses, essential oil & purified water, this facial water is a simple & effective solution to nourish your skin every day. Use as a toner, with face packs, or simply to refresh your face.

Benefits:
- Hydrates deeply
- Soothes & calms the skin
- Provides a healthy glow
